name: Karel Decherf
profile: Driven and analytical Solutions Architect with a lifelong passion for programming. Acting as an **AI-Augmented Lead Developer**, I leverage cutting-edge generative AI tools (Gemini 3.0, Jules) to architect and deliver complex full-stack solutions at triple the speed of traditional development. My background combines deep resilience with an intense, self-directed mastery of modern tech stacks. I am fully operational and ready to lead high-velocity projects.
notice: Available for freelance contracts and international remote work.

workExperience.description: Orchestrating autonomous AI agents to build full-stack web applications, Chrome extensions, and data pipelines. Specializing in rapid prototyping, legacy system modernization, and AI integration.
Developed strong work ethic and adaptability in various sectors while continuously self-educating in software development.
Developed and maintained custom web applications. Applied a range of web technologies to meet specific functional requirements.

skills.ai_orchestration: Google Antigravity, Google Jules 2.0, Gemini CLI, Prompt Engineering, Agentic Workflows, AI-Driven Code Generation
skills.full_stack_architecture: React (Vite, TypeScript), Python (FastAPI, Django), Node.js, Spring Boot, SQL, RESTful APIs
skills.cloud_devops: AWS, Google Cloud Platform, Docker, GitHub Actions (CI/CD), Firebase, Supabase
skills.testing_qa: Vitest, Playwright, Cygnet, Automated Testing Strategies
